credentials: MSN 2012 Maryville Univ Of St. Louis
name: BRITTA LOTHARY

ratings.comment: Britta is such a caring, compassionate instructor who genuinely cares about the success of her students. She has a fantastic ability to draw students' interest and explain complex concepts in ways students will remember. UW-Madison is so fortunate to have Britta as an instructor and I hope she is promoted to leadership roles.
One of my favorite professors in nursing. Made difficult concepts easy to understand and always willing to answer questions!
Britta is an AWESOME professor! Probably one of the best I've had in UW Madison.

Britta is amazing. She does a wonderful job making difficult concepts easy to understand. Put in the effort for this class and you will do well. The class is primarily about memorization. Highly recommend doing the review guides.

Britta was an amazing professor! She is very engaging in her lectures, and you can tell she really enjoys teaching students. Material is tough, but Britta explains it well. Study guides are very helpful for exams.
